name: Here Come The Young Avengers! Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Iron Lad.

	Iron Lad gathered four superpowered teens together in an attempt to reband the Avengers if the adult team were ever to disband. Hulkling, Wiccan, Iron Lad and Patriot came together to fight crime and continued even after Captain America told them to stop.

questions.text: Teddy Altman is Hulkling, but what famous superhero was his father?
questions.explanation:
Captain Marvel.

	Captain Marvel, a Kree warrior, died of cancer on Titan, Saturn's moon. Teddy is the result of Marvel's romantic involvement with a Skrull woman, making him a hybrid of two constantly warring races.

questions.text: Which member of the team abused Mutant Growth Hormone?
questions.explanation:
Patriot.

	Patriot used the illegal Mutant Growth Hormone to develop superpowers for brief periods; he wanted to contribute more to the team. A side effect of abuse is an increase in testiness.

questions.text: Captain America handed Clint Barton's bow and arrows to Kate Bishop.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Jessica Jones gave the weapons to Kate, saying that Captain America wanted her to have them. Although she has no superpowers, Kate is the driving force behind the team, working to keep them all together. She now goes by the name Hawkeye, just like Clint Barton before her.

questions.text: Complete this quote by Hulkling: "Why should ____________ have all the fun?"
questions.explanation:
Northstar.

	Northstar is an openly gay superhero who has been a member of the X-Men and of Alpha Flight. Hulkling says this when he and Wiccan decide to out themselves as a couple to the public.

questions.text: Iron Lad is a younger version of which villain?
questions.explanation:
Kang the Conqueror.

	Iron Lad is a younger version of Kang, who donned a suit of armor to become Iron Lad. He asked the rest of the Young Avengers to forgive him for the deeds he would do as Kang the Conqueror.

	Shepherd, as can be guessed from his codename, has the power of super speed, but he can also explode things by directing hyper kinetic vibrations at them. He has platinum blonde hair, much like the mutant Quicksilver.

questions.text: Stature is the daughter of Scott Lang, who went by the name Ant-Man. In the MC2 universe, what name did she go by?
questions.explanation:
Stinger.

	Cassie Lang greatly admired her father's work as a hero, eventually following him into the business despite the concerns of her mother and stepfather. She had previously considered joining the Runaways.

questions.text: As part of Marvel's "Civil War" event, what other team did the Young Avengers team up with?
questions.explanation:
The Runaways.

	The Runaways are a group of teenagers who ran away from home when the discovered that their parents were in a super-villain team known as The Pride.  Both teams opposed the Superhuman Registration Act, which required all superheroes to unmask and register themselves as weapons of mass destruction.

questions.text: Billy Kaplan's first codename was Hex.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Starting out as Asgardian, Billy changed his moniker to Wiccan shortly before he and Hulkling came out as a couple to the public to avoid the obvious joke. Kate Bishop suggested the name, and Billy declared that he didn't hate it.
